node.message_en: To save time, the organizer recommends voters to first pick the voting station they will be voting at (you can use this website to find your desired voting station and mark down its 4 digits station code). Afterwards, head up to the official voting website to fill in your digital ballot, then head to the selected local voting station for the remaining steps.
node.message_zh: 為節省時間，主辦單位建議選民先選定投票站(選民可以用本網站尋找投票站並記下四位數字票站編碼)，然後於電子選票網頁填寫電子選票，再親身前往該投票站繼續餘下流程。

node.message_en: Up until 15:01, 59,747 people voted in the primaries. This data is for reference only.
node.message_zh: 截至15:01，有59,747名市民於初選投票，此數據只供參考。
